attributes.action: Change the children in need bear 'pudsy' to 'Terry' in honour of Terry Wogan.
attributes.background: In honour of all of Sir Terry's hard and passionate work for children in need.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Children In Need is the responsibility of the BBC.

You could contact the BBC directly to make this suggestion: 

http://www.bbc.co.uk/contact
